annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: This interface is designed to provide a dbus interface of desktop file. Missing fields will be added later.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: Whem this property is 'deepin', display name of the application should use GenericName.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: Names of all action identifiers of this application. Check https://specifications.freedesktop.org/desktop-entry-spec/desktop-entry-spec-latest.html#extra-actions for futher information.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: Set the value of this property to -1 to indicates that some errors has occured.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: Set the value of this property to -1 to indicates that some errors has occured.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: Set the value of this property to -1 to indicates that some errors has occured.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: The desktop file id of this application. Check https://specifications.freedesktop.org/desktop-entry-spec/desktop-entry-spec-latest.html#desktop-file-id for futher infomation.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: Indicate this application should launch by terminal or not.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: Indicate the environment of application's instance. passing some specific environment variables to Launch this application, eg. 'LANG=en_US;PATH=xxx:yyy;'

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: The type of ActionName is a Map, first key represents action, second key represents locale and the value is the corresponding content.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: The type of IconName is a Map, where the key represents the action and the value is the corresponding content.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: The meaning of this property's type is same as which in ActionName.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value: The meaning of this property's type is same as which in ActionName.

annotation.name: org.freedesktop.DBus.Description
annotation.value:
Given an action identifier, and some fields (file path or URI), this method will launch this application, and the object path of the job launching application. Result of that job is a object path of the new application instance. If that job failed, the result is a bool `false`.
Extra options can be passed in `options` argument: 1. `uid` (type u): The user id as who is that application will be run. This option might request a polikit authentication. 2. `env` (type s): passing some specific environment variables to Launch this application, eg. 'LANG=en_US;PATH=xxx:yyy;' 3. `path` (type s): set this application's working directory, please pass absolute directory path. NOTE: When application launched with `uid` option, `env` option will not take effect at all.
